ios.debug.name: LiveBotRN
ios.debug.build: ENVFILE=.ci.env xcodebuild -configuration Debug -workspace ios/LiveBotRN.xcworkspace -scheme LiveBotRN -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

ios.release.name: LiveBotRN
ios.release.build: ENVFILE=.ci.env xcodebuild -configuration Release -workspace ios/LiveBotRN.xcworkspace -scheme LiveBotRN -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build

android.release.build: cd android && ENVFILE=.ci.env ./gradlew assembleDebug assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..
